title: Sights of London
brief_description: Shows well-known streets, buildings, churches, shopping centres and other parts of London, including the Tower, and the Nelson Column, of general interest to the tourist. One sequence shows the procession to celebrate the silver wedding of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth.
